mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VISIT_COMMENT (VR_NO, VC_NO, TT_NO, SS_NO, VC_COMMENTS, VC_INSERTDATE, VC_UPDATEDATE, VC_DELETEYN) VALUES (#{vrNo}, #{vcNo}, #{ttNo}, #{ssNo}, #{vcComments}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'Y')
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(VC_NO) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(SUBSTR(VC_NO, -4)) + 1 END AS VC_NO FROM VISIT_COMMENT
mapper.update: UPDATE VISIT_COMMENT SET VC_DELETEYN = 'N' WHERE VC_NO = (SELECT VC_NO FROM VISIT_COMMENT WHERE VR_NO = #{vrNo} AND VC_DELETEYN = 'Y') AND VC_DELETEYN = 'Y'
